original_text: It is difficult for you to understand these things, because you are still weak. So I am using a human picture of slaves to help you to understand better. At one time, you agreed to serve bad things as your master. You let your body do wrong and disgusting things. You continued to do more and more bad things. So now, you must use your body to serve what is right and good. Then you will do more and more good things which show that you belong to God.
korean_text: 너희 육신이 연약하므로 내가 사람의 예대로 말하노니 전에 너희가 너희 지체를 부정과 불법에 내주어 불법에 이른 것 같이 이제는 너희 지체를 의에게 종으로 내주어 거룩함에 이르라

sentences.original_text: It is difficult for you to understand these things
So I am using a human picture of slaves
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 저는 노예에 대한 인간적인 예를 사용하고 있습니다

sentences.original_text: to help you to understand better
At one time, you agreed to serve bad things
sentences.korean_translation: 한때, 당신은 나쁜 것들을 섬기기로 동의했습니다

sentences.original_text: You let your body do wrong and disgusting things
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 몸이 잘못되고 역겨운 일을 하도록 내버려 두었습니다

sentences.original_text: You continued to do more and more bad things
sentences.korean_translation: 점점 더 많은 나쁜 일들을 계속했습니다

sentences.original_text: So now, you must use your body
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 이제는 당신은 몸을 사용해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: to serve what is right and good
Then you will do more and more good things
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 당신은 점점 더 많은 좋은 일들을 하게 될 것입니다

sentences.original_text: which show that you belong to God
sentences.korean_translation: 그것들은 당신이 하나님께 속한다는 것을 보여줍니다
